project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would provide: (a) the development of three Government ranches in Shaba by the extension of their total ranching area from about 340,000 ha to about 700,000 ha; the purchase of about 10,000 breeding heifers and 700 bulls to increase stock on the three ranches from about 30,000 to 60,000 head at the end of the 6-year project investment period; the provision of buildings, vehicles, equipment, fencing materials and seeds; and (b) funds for the training of Zairian agricultural technicians and for the preparation of future livestock and other agricultural projects.
